businessProfile.name: Armani/Ristorante
businessProfile.address: 760 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 760 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

reviews.text:
Armani Ristorante in New York offers a chic and sophisticated ambiance with an impeccable Armani look and feel.

The service is exceptional, and the restaurant manager is incredible. Our waiter, George, was also incredibly professional.

For starters, the beef tartare with Corn Truffle and black garlic is excellent. The lamb ragu green tagliolini is cooked perfectly, but the highlight of the meal was definitely the short ribs with barbecue balsamic vinegar sauce and daikon radish slaw. And of course, the Italian ice-cream cart and sorbet is a must-try. They also offer the best bread service in NYC.

I visited this restaurant during Restaurant Week last month and was disappointed with the service. When I asked the server for recommendations on the main courses, she didn‚Äôt explain any of the dishes and simply said they were all good. I ended up choosing the chicken breast on my own. The meal overall was just average, though my expectations were higher for this place. The only highlight was the dessert. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd return, especially not at high-end prices for a mediocre experience.

Enjoyed a lovely dinner with friends here recently. The bread service alone was so outstanding that I would return again just for those amazing, crispy, super thin breadsticks. Our servers were attentive without hovering. The coursing was well-paced. And everything we had was impeccably made and delicious. The Spring Pea Risotto was perfectly cooked and a nice size to share as a small plate. My friend said her Veal Milanese was one of the best she's ever had. The wine selection here should also be noted as superior. Will definitely come back.

Armani Ristorante on Madison Avenue delivers an impeccable dining experience that seamlessly blends elegance, sophistication, and exceptional cuisine. From the moment you step into the stylishly minimalist space, adorned with Armani‚Äôs signature refined aesthetic, you‚Äôre enveloped in an atmosphere of quiet luxury.

The service is flawless‚Äîattentive yet never intrusive, with staff who exude professionalism and warmth. Every detail is thoughtfully executed, ensuring an experience that feels both indulgent and effortless.

The food? Simply incredible. Each dish is a masterclass in Italian craftsmanship, balancing tradition with modern refinement. Whether it‚Äôs a perfectly al dente pasta, a sumptuously tender cut of meat, or a delicately plated seafood dish, every bite is a testament to the kitchen‚Äôs expertise. The flavors are bold yet harmonious, with an emphasis on high-quality ingredients that shine on their own.

Pair your meal with a carefully curated wine selection, and you have a dining experience that is nothing short of extraordinary. Armani Ristorante isn‚Äôt just a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a statement of impeccable taste. Highly, hugely recommended.

A truly hidden gem. Food was tasty, service was impeccable, price was reasonable for fine dining. Bonus, the view of Fifth Ave. It wasn't busy during lunch time so no need to wait even without a reservation.

Dry aged steak was absolutely delicious. I would also highly recommend the appetit vitello tonnato. However, their signature dish risotto selezion was a bit too salty to my taste.

Overall, great experience and I will sure come back.

editorial_summary.overview: Upscale Italian restaurant and bar inside the namesake store, offering fine dining and wines.

recentReviews.author: Gabriele Tonini
recentReviews.text:
Armani Ristorante in New York offers a chic and sophisticated ambiance with an impeccable Armani look and feel.

The service is exceptional, and the restaurant manager is incredible. Our waiter, George, was also incredibly professional.

For starters, the beef tartare with Corn Truffle and black garlic is excellent. The lamb ragu green tagliolini is cooked perfectly, but the highlight of the meal was definitely the short ribs with barbecue balsamic vinegar sauce and daikon radish slaw. And of course, the Italian ice-cream cart and sorbet is a must-try. They also offer the best bread service in NYC.

recentReviews.author: Gina Ingraham
recentReviews.text: Enjoyed a lovely dinner with friends here recently. The bread service alone was so outstanding that I would return again just for those amazing, crispy, super thin breadsticks. Our servers were attentive without hovering. The coursing was well-paced. And everything we had was impeccably made and delicious. The Spring Pea Risotto was perfectly cooked and a nice size to share as a small plate. My friend said her Veal Milanese was one of the best she's ever had. The wine selection here should also be noted as superior. Will definitely come back.

recentReviews.author: Victor Ceniceros
recentReviews.text:
Armani Ristorante on Madison Avenue delivers an impeccable dining experience that seamlessly blends elegance, sophistication, and exceptional cuisine. From the moment you step into the stylishly minimalist space, adorned with Armani‚Äôs signature refined aesthetic, you‚Äôre enveloped in an atmosphere of quiet luxury.

The service is flawless‚Äîattentive yet never intrusive, with staff who exude professionalism and warmth. Every detail is thoughtfully executed, ensuring an experience that feels both indulgent and effortless.

The food? Simply incredible. Each dish is a masterclass in Italian craftsmanship, balancing tradition with modern refinement. Whether it‚Äôs a perfectly al dente pasta, a sumptuously tender cut of meat, or a delicately plated seafood dish, every bite is a testament to the kitchen‚Äôs expertise. The flavors are bold yet harmonious, with an emphasis on high-quality ingredients that shine on their own.

Pair your meal with a carefully curated wine selection, and you have a dining experience that is nothing short of extraordinary. Armani Ristorante isn‚Äôt just a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a statement of impeccable taste. Highly, hugely recommended.

recentReviews.author: Shirley T
recentReviews.text: I visited this restaurant during Restaurant Week last month and was disappointed with the service. When I asked the server for recommendations on the main courses, she didn‚Äôt explain any of the dishes and simply said they were all good. I ended up choosing the chicken breast on my own. The meal overall was just average, though my expectations were higher for this place. The only highlight was the dessert. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd return, especially not at high-end prices for a mediocre experience.

recentReviews.author: Joanne Z
recentReviews.text:
A truly hidden gem. Food was tasty, service was impeccable, price was reasonable for fine dining. Bonus, the view of Fifth Ave. It wasn't busy during lunch time so no need to wait even without a reservation.

Dry aged steak was absolutely delicious. I would also highly recommend the appetit vitello tonnato. However, their signature dish risotto selezion was a bit too salty to my taste.

Overall, great experience and I will sure come back.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the impeccable service, highlighting attentive yet non-intrusive staff who exude professionalism and warmth. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The chic and sophisticated ambiance, with an impeccable Armani look and feel, creates an atmosphere of quiet luxury that customers love. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The outstanding bread service, particularly the amazing, crispy, super thin breadsticks, is a standout feature that customers would return for. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Lack of detailed menu knowledge by staff - social media marketing can improve this area
Mediocre dining experience not matching high-end pricing - review management can address this concern
Negative perception due to average meal experience - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
